pages.text: $(mod)Tanky$() adds two tiers of multiblock $(item)Tanks$(), which store fluids depending on their size. The bigger the multiblock, the more fluid stored.

Place the $(item)Tank Controller$() in the center of the tank's floor, and then make the rest of the Tank out of $(item)Tank Walls$(). Non-corners can be $(item)Tank Glass$() if desired.$(br2)Tanks can be uo to 24 blocks tall, and 19 blocks wide.
Fluids can be inserted or extracted from any part of the Tank. $(br2)Breaking the Tank Controller will destroy all the fluid inside.
